name: SWOLLEN TO BURSTING UNTIL I AM DISAPPEARING ON PURPOSE
name_original: SWOLLEN TO BURSTING UNTIL I AM DISAPPEARING ON PURPOSE
description:
"Just recently, in "Vomit", a flying saucer appears."



"SWOLLEN TO BURSTING" is a weirdo RPG in which something is very wrong.
A flying saucer has crash-landed in town, but it's Thursday so you have to go to work at the post office.

THE COOL FEATURES OF "SWOLLEN TO BURSTING"


    ORACULAR GAMEPLAY!

    You're free to do what you'd like in "SWOLLEN TO BURSTING". Engage in various misadventures in order to gain access to more places. Find a way into the flying saucer and solve the mysteries within! (If you want.)There are many strange secrets to discover. We bet you can't find them all!

    EXPLORATION IN THE TOWN OF "VOMIT"!

    Enjoy humorous and sincere interactions a variety of fun characters! Meet and get to know everybody over the course of a day. Dine in at the café, or maybe fish up at the pond!

    CUTTING EDGE 3D "GRAPHICS" & AN ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK!

    "SWOLLEN TO BURSTING" features a variety of diverse, explorable locations. As you progress through the story, time will move forward in town. The weather and lighting will change throughout the in-game day.

    OVER A DOZEN "EFFECTS" TO COLLECT!

    Collectable "Effects" can be used in a multitude of ways:
    • Level up to get past enemies!
    • Obtain clues to help you progress!
    • Make cosmetic changes to your character!
    • And maybe more!(?)

FANS OF THESE WILL LOVE "SWOLLEN TO BURSTING":


  • Strange JRPGs such as "Yume Nikki" & "Chulip"
  • Old JRPGs such as "Final Fantasy 4" & "Mother"
  • The Beatles' self titled album
  • Hideaki Anno movies
  • And other stuff but we don't wanna give too much away


"SWOLLEN TO BURSTING UNTIL I AM DISAPPEARING ON PURPOSE" is just a few hours long.
You could probably play it before going to bed two or three times and be finished.
We hope you will play the game and have a good time.

You're doing better than you think.
